contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox Album <!-- See Wikipedia:WikiProject_Albums --> | Name = Up All Night | Type = Studio Album | Artist = [[Pajama Party (vocal group)|Pajama Party]] | Cover = Pajama_Party_Up_All_Night.jpeg | Released = October 23, 1989 | Recorded = | Genre = [[Freestyle music|Latin freestyle]], [[R&B]] | Length = 49:53 | Label = [[Atlantic Records|Atlantic]] | Producer =[[ Jim Klein]] | Last album = | This album = '''''Up All Night'''''<br />(1989) | Next album = ''[[Can't Live Without It]]''<br />(1991) | Misc = {{Singles | Name = Up All Night | Type = studio | single 1 = [[Yo No Sé]] | single 2 = [[Over and Over (Pajama Party song)|Over and Over]] | single 3 = [[Hide and Seek (Pajama Party song)|Hide and Seek]] | single 1 date = 1988 | single 2 date = 1989 | single 3 date = 1990 }} }} {{Album ratings | rev1 = Warr.org | rev1Score = {{Rating|2|5}} [http://www.warr.org/odd80s.html#UpAllNight link] | noprose = yes }} '''''Up All Night''''' is the first full-length album by [[Pajama Party (vocal group)|Pajama Party]], an American [[R&B]]/[[Dance music|Dance]]/[[pop music|Pop]] female vocal trio from Brooklyn, New York. ==Track listing== {{Tracklist | lyrics_credits = no | music_credits = no | title1 = [[Over and Over (Pajama Party song)|Over and Over]] | length1 = 6:05 | title2 = [[Hide and Seek (Pajama Party song)|Hide and Seek]] | length2 = 4:14 | title3 = Lovelight | length3 = 4:10 | title4 = Living Inside Your Love | length4 = 4:56 | title5 = [[Yo No Sé]] | length5 = 5:41 | title6 = Surfing in Babylon | length6 = 4:41 | title7 = Bringing All Your Love to Me | length7 = 4:17 | title8 = Loving You | length8 = 4:47 }} '''CD Edition''' {{Tracklist | title9 = Over and Over | note9 = B.F.E. Mix | length9 = 5:36 | title10 = Yo No Sé | note10 = B.F.E./23 West Mix | length10 = 5:23 }} ==Charts== '''Singles''' - Billboard (North America) {| class="wikitable" !Year !Single !Chart !Position |- |rowspan="6"|1988/1989 |rowspan="3"|"Yo No Sé" |Hot Dance Music/Club Play |align="center"|34 |- |Hot Dance Music/Maxi-Singles Sales |align="center"|17 |- |The Billboard Hot 100 |align="center"|75 |- |rowspan="3"|"Over and Over" |Hot Dance Music/Club Play |align="center"|26 |- |Hot Dance Music/Maxi-Singles Sales |align="center"|4 |- |The Billboard Hot 100 |align="center"|59 |- |rowspan="3"|1990 |rowspan="3"|"Hide and Seek" |Hot Dance Music/Club Play |align="center"|33 |- |Hot Dance Music/Maxi-Singles Sales |align="center"|17 |- |The Billboard Hot 100 |align="center"|73 |} ==External links== * [{{Allmusic|class=album|id=r14765|pure_url=yes}} Allmusic.com entry] * [http://www.myspace.com/pajamapartymusic My Space Official Page] {{1980s-album-stub}} [[Category:1989 albums]] [[Category:Freestyle music albums]] [[Category:Pajama Party albums]]
